this is the brave petrel , in roars on sea , among lightning , arrogant soaring ; This is the victory prophet is yelling .这是勇敢的海燕，在怒吼的大海上，在闪电中间，高傲的飞翔；这是胜利的预言家在叫喊。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: associated with St Peter, from the bird's habit of flying low with legs dangling, giving the appearance of walking on the water (see Matt. 14:30)

entry.def: A petrel is a type of sea bird which often flies a long way from land. There are many kinds of petrel.

means.word_mean: 1. relatively small long-winged tube-nosed bird that flies far from land
